survey_name: Public Library Digital Resource Usage Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how patrons use digital resources offered by public libraries to improve services and accessibility.

questions.question_text: How often do you access digital resources (e-books, audiobooks, databases, etc.) provided by your local public library?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly dropdown if implemented.

script.question_text: How often do you access digital resources (e-books, audiobooks, databases, etc.) provided by your local public library?

questions.question_text: Which types of digital library resources do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select question. Include an 'Other' option with text field for specificity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Add optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which types of digital library resources do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges, if any, do you face when using the library's digital resources?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback. Limit to 250 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text (OPEN_TEXT) with character limit.

script.question_text: What challenges, if any, do you face when using the library's digital resources?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of digital resources available through your library?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected anything other than 'Never' in Q1
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale for granular feedback. Hide if Q1 = 'Never'.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Skip logic: show only if Q1 ≠ 'Never'.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of digital resources available through your library?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected anything other than 'Never' in Q1

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in training sessions to better utilize the library's digital resources?
answer_options: No, I’m comfortable with current resources
questions.client_notes: Single-choice with practical options for program planning.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in training sessions to better utilize the library's digital resources?
answer_options: No, I’m comfortable with current resources
